snippet.title: Guns N' Boxes Teaser - Available on Steam Fall 2016
snippet.description:
Guns N’ Boxes is a unique top-down single screen arena-style multiplayer shooter in which you fire at boxes, collect random weapons and use special items to blast everything that moves! 

Choose your favourite zany character from across the spacetime continuum and duke it out with rifles, hot dog launchers, spoons, rail guns, arrows, magical spells and tons of other weapons. Compete against the CPU, or even better, play with your friends in tremendous Bomberman scented battles. Classic and new all in one!

https://www.facebook.com/gunsnboxes
https://www.twitter.com/gunsnboxes
http://www.gunsnboxes.com
http://www.lightarrowgames.com
